channel.title: Finding coordinates
channel.description:
ok well i wanna add a few NPCs to my server but i don't know how to find the coordinates :S, i the client i have doesn't show the coordinates and when i try to play it on silabsoft it crashes, can anyone tell me how to find out the coordinates or provide me with a recent client that shows coordinates?
Thank You

omg im so stupid xD that command is already added and i didnt even kno >.> lol, but thx atleast now i kno where to add it and find it lol

item.title: Finding coordinates
item.dc:creator: @Rasmux Rasmux
item.description:
@Rasmux wrote:

Download this list :
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wzezgvnjg1m

Also add that command into ur client cuz is useful.

Edit : u have to put the command into ur client.java find any command u have there like try ::home or ::yell and Add it before or after.

item.title: Finding coordinates
item.dc:creator: @m_is_ftw m is ftw
item.description:
@m_is_ftw wrote:

try puting this into your commands

if(command.startsWith(“mypos”) && playerRights > 1){
sendMessage(“AbsX: “+absX+” AbsY: “+absY+””);
}

Read full topic
